name: A Dash Of...
description:
Thanks for checking out A Dash of...! This was a game made in 48 hours for The Games Den Quick Jam. Mainly, it was just me messing around with Ren'py code. Sorry if the plot is incoherent. In a way, it's a demo for an upcoming "Untitled Detective Game"...

And also a sidestory to Story Together, I guess.

Credits:   

Emi design by jonnydook at https://www.instagram.com/jonnydook/

Music:
Investigation, Laid_Back3, and Atmosphere_Dark by PeriTune at https://peritune.com/    
Cracked Glass by マニーラ at https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play15434.html 
探偵のいるBAR by Notzan ACT at https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play12254.html

Sounds: 
BUSSATA by gambler9 at https://freesound.org/people/gambler9/sounds/85087/
Rain - Moderate Rain by theminkman at https://freesound.org/people/TheMinkman/sounds/437037/

All other assets drawn by Gremlin Corp. Yes, the whole corporation.

Special thanks to The Games Den and viewers like you!
